parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the configuration to add

parameters.name: IsPhysicalProduct
parameters.description: True to add a parent configuration (Physical Product), false to add a derived configuration (Representation)

parameters.name: RepresentationParentName
parameters.description: Parent Physical Product name of derived configuration (Representation); valid only if IsPhysicalProduct is false

parameters.name: ConfigOptions
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined by swCADFamilyCfgOptions_e

parameters.name: ChildCompDisplayOption
parameters.description: Child component display option as defined in swChildComponentInBOMOption_e

parameters.name: Rebuild
parameters.description: True to rebuild the model after adding this configuration, false to not

title: IConfigurationManager.AddCADFamilyConfiguration
description: Adds the specified configuration to SOLIDWORKS Design Augmented.
signature:
System.Object AddCADFamilyConfiguration( 
   System.String
Name
,
   System.String
Description
,
   System.Boolean
IsPhysicalProduct
,
   System.String
RepresentationParentName
,
   System.Int32
ConfigOptions
,
   System.Int32
ChildCompDisplayOption
,
   System.Boolean
Rebuild
)

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the configuration to add

parameters.name: IsPhysicalProduct
parameters.description: True to add a parent configuration (Physical Product), false to add a derived configuration (Representation)

parameters.name: RepresentationParentName
parameters.description: Parent Physical Product name of derived configuration (Representation); valid only if IsPhysicalProduct is false

parameters.name: ConfigOptions
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined by swCADFamilyCfgOptions_e

parameters.name: ChildCompDisplayOption
parameters.description: Child component display option as defined in swChildComponentInBOMOption_e

parameters.name: Rebuild
parameters.description: True to rebuild the model after adding this configuration, false to not
